Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Book Review Editor of Language Problems & Language Planning (LPLP), journal published by John Benjamins.
Co-founder and Director of the journal Interlingvistikaj Kajeroj (InKoj). Università di Milano.
Main Contributor to the Linguistic Bibliography of BRILL, Leiden, for the section "planned languages".

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: External Advisor of the PhD in Computer Science at the Trinity College Dublin. Candidate: Luca Longo. Dissertation: Formalising mental workload as a defeasible computational concept. Internal Advisor: Wincent Wade.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Honorary Fellow in Applied Linguistics, International Academy of Sciences, San Marino.

Professore ordinario (Hoogleraar) su cattedra speciale in Interlinguistica ed Esperanto, Università di Amsterdam.

Research student of PASCAL2 (Pattern Analysis, Statistical Modelling and Computational Learning) Network of Excellence, FP7-EU.
